lead_paragraph: The 2017 model addresses problems with steering, road noise and a lack of structure in its 2016 counterpart.

headline.print_headline: Elantra Offers Fewer Curves, but Better Ride
headline.main: Video Review: Hyundai Elantra Offers Fewer Curves, but a Better Ride

snippet: The 2017 model addresses problems with steering, road noise and a lack of structure in its 2016 counterpart.
abstract: Driven column review of 2017 Hyundai Elantra.
